title: Hello World! 🌍✨
content:
Welcome to Exercard! This is a free, open-source flashcard app designed to make learning more efficient with personalized spaced repetition. With AI-powered features and cross-platform support, Exercard helps you study smarter and retain information better.

Stay tuned for more updates and a merry christmas! 🎄🎁
